title: Alternative Approach Acupunture
cleaned_text: At Alternative Approach Acupuncture & Wellness, PLLC we strive to provide you with the best of both worlds, a medical facility with experienced- highly trained professionals and a friendly, family oriented staff. Located in Patchogue, New York Acupuncture is an effective form of health care that has evolved into a complete and holistic medical system to help people get well and stay healthy. Other services include: Acutron, Advanced Kinesiology, Cosmetic Acupuncture, Cupping, Facial Rejuvination, Medical & Therapeutic Massages, and more! At Alternative Approach Acupuncture & Wellness, PLLC we strive to provide you with the best of both worlds, a medical facility with experienced, highly trained professionals and a friendly, family oriented staff. © 2023 [AAA Wellness](https://aaawellness.org/) Web Site Design & Development by Logic Web Media Our acupuncturists and medical massage therapists believe in an alternative approach to medical care in their personal lives as well as professionally. By phone, fax, e-mail, or our secure online portal, contacting us couldn't be easier. Please click below for options.
